sentences.sentence: Tattooing is not just the province of sailors.
sentences.translation: 纹身不只是水手们才感兴趣的事。

sentences.sentence: We decided to not pursue any tattooing system for Mask of the Betrayer.
sentences.translation: 我们决定在资料片里不再增加纹身系统。

sentences.sentence: Tattoos may be more common than ever, but don't take tattooing lightly.
sentences.translation: 纹身这事儿现在越来越常见，但不要轻易纹身！ 纹身前需要做一系列的功课，比如：纹身有风险吗？
